theme.header_infos:
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1, maximum-scale=1">
        <style>
	body{
		background-image:url(themes/PennArRock/images/background.jpg);
		background-attachment:fixed;
		background-repeat:no-repeat;
		background-position:center top;
	}
	</style>

    <!--[if lt IE 9]>
	    <script src="themes/PennArRock/js/html5shiv.js"></script>
	    <script src="themes/PennArRock/js/respond.min.js"></script>
    <![endif]-->       
    <link rel="shortcut icon" href="themes/PennArRock/images/ico/favicon.ico">
    <link rel="apple-touch-icon-precomposed" sizes="144x144" href="themes/PennArRock/images/ico/apple-touch-icon-144-precomposed.png">
    <link rel="apple-touch-icon-precomposed" sizes="114x114" href="themes/PennArRock/images/ico/apple-touch-icon-114-precomposed.png">
    <link rel="apple-touch-icon-precomposed" sizes="72x72" href="themes/PennArRock/images/ico/apple-touch-icon-72-precomposed.png">
    <link rel="apple-touch-icon-precomposed" href="themes/PennArRock/images/ico/apple-touch-icon-57-precomposed.png">
